pages.text: Any respectable druid can carve enchanted runes, allowing natural (or otherworldly) energies to flow through the ancient symbols. However, a sword is far to long an inelegant for carving. Instead, druids use knives for their various runes, carving into stone and wood alike.

Druids call this "Runic Carving" and can engrave this runes while holding a petal pouch with the required herb in their offhand.$(br2)Knives are also an elegant offensive weapon for a druid, with a high attack speed, but lower damage than a sword.
